title: Best diploma project
description: At the end of my higher education in application development, I received the cantonal award for the best final project. This project, combining development and cybersecurity, involved securing confidential data within a production software. The award recognized my analytical skills, my deliverables, as well as my reports and summaries.

title: Solidarity and comradeship
description: The year I completed my compulsory schooling, my teachers and the school administration agreed to create a special award for me, recognizing my social skills and my commitment to supporting classmates through academic difficulties.
